page.title: 12BUTTERWICK FISH SHOP
page.content: {Mr.and Mrs.Horton}got the idea of starting a fish and chip shop when Harold,the owner,was made redundant.They had had one before and they couldn't do anything else because Harold was over fifty years of age and he couldn't get a job anywhere else. But as soon as this came on the market they bought it and started their business.They have deliveries of fish from{Grimsby}from a man called {Peter Cadies}twice a week. They use up to thirty bags of potatoes a week.They have been in this business for two and a half years and they like the job. They use locally grown potatoes. {Price List} Cod 57p,Haddock 60p,Plaice 60p, Skate 60p Fish cake 22p, Fishbit and chips 34p, Sausage 22p, Pies 52p, Curry sauce 16p, Beans 18p, Chips 21p,26p,30p. Pizza 43p, Peas 16p.
